overview/manage_your_tasks/description: You can easily manage all of your daily tasks in DoMe for free.
overview/organize_your_tasks/description: You can organize your daily tasks by adding your tasks into separate categories.
overview/create_daily_routine/descriptio: In %s  you can create your personalized routine to stay productive.
overview/personalize_your_color/descript: Choose the app's primary color and customize the interface to match your style.
overview/get_started/description: You've completed all the steps. Now you're ready to explore and start using DoMe to boost your productivity!
